headline: Is CarMax a Value Opportunity After a 12.7% Bounce and Sharp Recent Drop?
summary: Wondering if CarMax is a bargain right now? You are not alone, especially with so much talk about undervalued opportunities in today’s market. CarMax shares have bounced up 12.7% in just the past week, but that is after a sharp drop of almost 21% over the last month and a tough year with the stock down 57.2% year-to-date. Recent headlines highlight wider economic concerns around used car demand and consumer spending, fueling dramatic swings in CarMax's share price...
